website_summaries.verdict: Constructed from quality materials. Keeps coffee fresh for up to three weeks.
pros: Made of high-quality borosilicate glass that's dishwasher safe and easy to clean
Durable, easy to use, and BPA-free
cons: Carafe glass is on the fragile side and cracks easily

customer_reviews.title: Makes great coffee but...
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this worked very well. However, I stored the cold brew pieces all put together. When I removed the infuser, there was a pop and the carafe cracked. The glass is very thin. I am ordering a second one because it does make great cold brew. I will just not store it all put together anymore. I have edited my original review. The Kungroo company reached out to me. They are sending me a replacement for my broken cold brew maker. They have a 60 day replacement/refund policy. I explained what happened to my carafe. I was out of the 60 day refund so they offered to send me a replacement. I really appreciate this.
customer_reviews.author: Book reader

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: I just received my new Kungroo, and I am exremely happy with the quality of the design and materials. The strainer insert for the coffee is nicely made. The top fits securely. The instructions could not have been easier to follow. I enjoyed my first glass of iced coffee and found it to very flavorful and smooth tasting. This was an all around good purchase. I am especially impressed that the seller reached out to make sure I am satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Grendel

customer_reviews.title: Well, was good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to use, flavor was good except the filter tended to allow grains into pot bottom but I was using slightly smaller grind. Only drawback is shape which makes it hard to clean which lead to my breaking it since I was trying to get to the bottom and it slipped and tapped the edge of our sink/marble counter and now it is broken. Not a cool investment for this little time of use. Buy it again, no just based on how fragile it is. I've downgraded it since apparently the company reaches out to some customers who had bad experience but not all. Hmmm.
customer_reviews.author: BDude

customer_reviews.title: nice cold brew container
customer_reviews.text: great little pot, makes 32 oz of cold brew. Easy to use and the inner filter is stainless steel and the holes are small enough that it does not let sediment through. Love the sealing top, Pot came well packaged and protected. A pleasure to use and it is pretty too.
customer_reviews.author: Myoung

customer_reviews.title: Painless brewing process. Great quality. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this was my first cold coffee brewer and I can tell you it was painless. The device comes with instructions that you can adjust to taste but it gets you started. Not much to do really but it’s good to have measurements to get started. Other than that I found I had to clean out the filter and place it back in the container to make sure there is good enough seal so it won’t go stale. Also you could run the coffee through a filter once you’re done to remove any grime or remaining coffee grounds. Just FYI
customer_reviews.author: Julian Salas

customer_reviews.title: You might need more coffee to produce results
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product; however, following the instructions and amounts suggested, I’ve found it hard to get strong coffee from it. Currently fairly watery so that part of the process isn’t working well for me. The container itself is wonderfully constructed, easy to clean, etc. At this point? The problem in getting the desired results lies in me - not the product. Not giving up - an will try more coffee in the cylinder.
customer_reviews.author: JHS - Fairfax County VA

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cold brewer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about using this brewer!!! It is perfect size to use to make cold brew!! Tastes ohhh soo good!!! The stainless steel screen keeps the grounds from getting in your coffee!!! It is so fine and perfectly made. I have used other cold brewers/ i think this will hold up long term. So easy to make cold brew with this!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: D.slat2015

customer_reviews.title: Air tight?!?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this got so many stars... “for storage, remove the lid and attach it onto the glass for an air tight seal.” Not sure how this is air tight! You can see down the spout and pour liquid from it with the lid on!
customer_reviews.author: CrazyDogLady

customer_reviews.title: FRAGILE!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the cold brewer, it made great coffee and was really nicely done. BUT, I took it out of the cabinet, and it cracked on the base of the handle. I had only used it periodically during the summer. I was disappointed that it would just break. It was at the joint where the bottom of the handle joined the glass. I reached out by email to the company, but did not hear back.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: ... the instructions that came with the product and was disappointed. The brew came out weak- i had to ...
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions that came with the product and was disappointed. The brew came out weak- i had to stop for coffee on my way to work because i just couldn't drink it :( i used 16 TBS of coursely ground coffee as the instructions said, poured 32 oz of water over it and let is brew for 24 hours. it seemed odd because the water didn't even cover all of the grounds. the cap is also not airtight.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get any better than this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He enjoys cold brew coffee. The maker he asked for last Christmas was just a hassle to use so he quit using it. I found this, oddly enough, on Pinterest. He LOVES it! Uses it constantly. He is in awe of the simplicity of making the coffee and the thickness of the glass. Perfect sized for him. You have a very satisfied customer :)
customer_reviews.author: Cherie L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Very simple to use and makes great cold brew coffee. It takes a little time to fill the pot as the water slowly seeps through the filter into the pot. Worth the wait though. Then let it sit in the frig overnight and have great cold brew in the morning. I am the only one that drinks it and one pot will last me 3-4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Judi M.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy weight decanter
customer_reviews.text: The concept is good, the product easy to use, and it produces quality iced coffee, but the decanter is way too flimsy. The slightest contact with the kitchen sink or surrounding counter top when cleaning it and the glass decanter shatters or splinters. I broke my first one, reordered a replacement, and just broken the replacement. So, I am two purchases into it and have nothing to show for it in a year's time. I will not purchase a third replacement but will use the (now) two stainless steel brewing tube inserts in two more substantially-manufactured 32-oz. Mason jars going forward and make double batches each time I brew.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene F. McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use & Saves Money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece for a cold brew lover (not beer, in this case). It came well packed, and is well made. Excellent and easy instructions. Now just need to find the right coffee, and will then save a lot of money on the bottled stuff! I highly recommend as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great but filter could be better
customer_reviews.text: I use to use a French press but it broke so decided to use this product I was too satisfied there is too much sediment and coffee particles that come up. I used French press so I know sediment is normal but with this product it’s too much I tried filtering it out and putting cold brew pouches in there to help and it did but it’s a lot more work rather than convenient
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sweet.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, very good quality product. Gave it as a gift to my Dad who was very pleased with it. The only concern is that the gasket which seals the lid in place seems very thin. We contacted the Kungroo company to inquire about replacement gaskets or other components, it's been a month with no response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well and is easy to use and clean. Makes a delicious cold brewed coffee and is great for a small pot of regular coffee. Definitely recommend for cold brew enthusiasts.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Nizi

customer_reviews.title: The cap also didn't seal super tight.
customer_reviews.text: Followed instructions exactly and wound up with a weak concentrate that was even more watered down when diluted to the 1:1 ratio suggested. The cap also didn't seal super tight.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I wasn’t impressed because I had to further strain it. Well I came to realize my coffee grounds were way too fine. So I adjusted that and it’s the best product I’ve purchased. Perfect size for my husband and I.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I looked at several options but ultimately chose this one because of the reviews that stated how great their customer service was. This product is super easy to use, easy to clean, and makes GREAT coffee! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for myself because I wanted a better way to make iced coffee. Promptly bought a second one for my parents. Works great, coffee storage is great, and small enough for the fridge. They do recommend course ground and I can second that because I didn’t my first time and had some grains. It’s been better since.
customer_reviews.author: brendan white

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time doing cold brew coffee. After a few tries absolutely love this cold brew maker . Definitely seems like it's well built and definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: perry dipace

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! So easy to use and very easy to clean. Comes with great directions for iced coffee and iced tea. I've only been drinking iced coffee since receiving this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Z.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for X-mas. She loves it. The filter is very fine and no coffee grinds get into the water. Also, it has an airtight seal so the coffee aroma stays within the pot and doesn't permeate through your fridge. Vice versa, other aromas from the fridge don't permeate into your coffee. This product makes it easy to setup some cold brew!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first cold brew maker. So far so good. It is well constructed. It is a sturdy glass container that comes with an airtight lid. I use this almost everyday. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie S.

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmmm...cold brew👍🤤😇👸🏼
customer_reviews.text: Super simple design. I'm a little paranoid that the glass will brake since it's pretty thin but the convenience is so awesome. My husband really loved this for his Valentine's gift from me.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Vander Plaats

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Cold Brew!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing!! It arrived quickly and the packaging was secure. It’s easy to clean and so easy to use. Makes fantastic cold brew! I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Coffee lovers gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for father’s day and it was a hit. Makes delicious cold coffee, Is easy to use and clean, and fits in the fridge nicely. I Need to see if this company makes larger sized ones for when I have company over.
customer_reviews.author: Sharri Joseph

customer_reviews.title: The best cold coffee maker I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy cold coffee from the store. Now i use this daily. In fact it hasn't even had time to dry out since I bought it because I keep refilling it every single day.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: A just right cold brew coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I compared product reviews on several types & picked this one as the best for me. My female hand is still a smidge small to push a dishcloth through when hand washing but there are multiple ways around that - the only reason for 4 stars for easy to clean category. Instructions are easy to follow & helpful. Enjoying my new coffee so far!
customer_reviews.author: N.Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This little coffee maker is perfect and have zero complaints. It's very well made and I like the fairly compact design. My initial batch of coffee was strong enough to knock out a gorilla but that's on me - just added more water and I was good to go!
customer_reviews.author: NerdAlert

customer_reviews.title: Attractive glass brewer
customer_reviews.text: Great filter. Easy to clean. Very attractive. Bad pour "spout". There is barely a "spout" to speak of. If the glass were pulled a little more to create an actual pouring spot in the lip of the glass rim, I would upgrade. my rating. As it is, coffee spills out of this every single time and runs down the pitcher. This design flaw could easily be corrected.
customer_reviews.author: G Brinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making your own cold brew
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for ourselves and then purchased more as gifts. The quality is amazing. Really happy with the size of the jar and filter. You won't find loose coffee grounds flooring around. This is perfect if you want to make your own cold brew for the week.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Springsteen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is our first cold brew coffee maker and we love it! We followed the easy directions that came with the carafe and our coffee turned out smooth and lovely! Easy to clean and no more fragile than our French press. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AnneP

customer_reviews.title: Made great cold coffee
customer_reviews.text: The pitcher was nice to look at, while the insert had a fine strain on it. The rubber gasket and top kept the coffee very fresh so I did not have to make out everyday. Unfortunately, we banged around the pitcher and it broke. I do not have original product to contact them. Is it possible to get an address to discuss getting a pitcher replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Ann S.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Invention!
customer_reviews.text: I really like Kungroo Cold Water Brew to make iced coffee. It's really easy to use and you can see how strong the coffee has become. The insert keeps coffee grounds from getting into the water, which is the best thing ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great for brewing a pot of coffee!
customer_reviews.text: This cold brew carafe brews a great pot of cold brew! I had been using a Mason jar previously and this is so much easier to use, clean, & store! I have only had for a few weeks now, so I'm unsure of the durability, but hoping it will hold up over time too!
customer_reviews.author: skatulihead

customer_reviews.title: Great coffeee machine !
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. I've been waiting for something like this. It was on my wish list from my family and I finally got it.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Great little coffee brewer
customer_reviews.text: This little brewer makes really great coffee and is easy to use. I love that the coffee grounds are completely removed after it’s finished brewing.
customer_reviews.author: JEG

customer_reviews.title: The glass is better quality than the one that I am replacing
customer_reviews.text: Feels solid. The glass is better quality than the one that I am replacing. 20% discount, was hard not to buy it
customer_reviews.author: ai589

customer_reviews.title: Fragile but makes a nice cold brew.
customer_reviews.text: It’s so very fragile, it only lasted a few weeks, needs a cover to protect it. The coffee (your own favorite) is perfect nor any bitterness with cold brew
customer_reviews.author: Idealist

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made..... I was putting dishes away and the glass on the bottom of the carafe cracked, making it unusable. I had it for exactly a month. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous
customer_reviews.text: First time making cold brew coffee. Very easy to use. Coffee tastes great. The only problem with making cold brewed coffee yourself is the lack of instant gratification - but the results of this are worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: JOC

customer_reviews.title: I got it quickly and it looks so awesome. I know he will love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my husband for christmas. I got it quickly and it looks so awesome. I know he will love it! Cant wait for him to open it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kimrey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: High quality steel filter column contains coffeeground residue very well. No more need for filter pads as with other cold brew systems.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee maker!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure of which cold coffee brewer to purchase, but after reading tons of reviews, I chose this one for my first time trying to cold brew. Omg! It is fantastic! So easy to use and in 24 hours I had the best coffee I have ever had! It is just me drinking it, so it lasts for about a week. Love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Eline

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Coffee is delicious. The Glass is a little fragile. We love it, but treat it with care.
customer_reviews.author: Jrod

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. With temps in the 90’s here and high humidity I want coffee, just not hot. Really enjoying iced mochas. Directions are clear, and the carafe is well made and sleek so it doesn’t take up too much room in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Bec.

customer_reviews.title: Way too difficult to clean because you can’t get your hand in the vessel
customer_reviews.text: The taste of the coffee is great. Some ground still seem to seep through the filter. I just am very conscientious that I’m going to break the glass vessel because it just seems so fragile
customer_reviews.author: Carol Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but filter isn’t great
customer_reviews.text: Great design and durable. The coffee grounds would go through into the coffee through. Needs an extra filter between the coffee and the metal mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Make your own cold Brew coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Glass container works well for it's purpose. Does what it should.
customer_reviews.author: jstpgms

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: It's not one to handle roughly but an effective way to brew your favorite icedd coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Love this cold brew maker!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this cold brew maker! Easy to use. Fairly easy to clean and makes my day! Would suggest and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: RM5528132

customer_reviews.title: So worth it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing so simple so delicious. So glad I bought it
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but I drink a lot of coffee so this only lasts a day or two
customer_reviews.author: lezlie

customer_reviews.title: My first brew was very tasty and easy to do
customer_reviews.text: My first brew was very tasty and easy to do. I've had a cup every morning and love it. Also, customer service is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Melinda K

customer_reviews.title: Very thin glass
customer_reviews.text: It was very thin glass and broke the first time I used it
customer_reviews.author: B.A.DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glass! Seems like like it’s of great quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glass! Seems like like it’s of great quality. Making the coffee was easy. I havent tasted it yet but hopefully it will taste as great as I think it will.
customer_reviews.author: Pepandcut

customer_reviews.title: He told me that this makes some of the best cold brew he has ever had
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my brother in law for his birthday. He LOVES cold brew coffee so i was very hesitant. He told me that this makes some of the best cold brew he has ever had, but uses a lot of coffee. BUT.... he loved it! I was very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Cold brew it up!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! However I do feel like it could be larger. We make a batch and it’s enough for the two of us for one day. The markers on the glass also rubbed off but I can eye it no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: PJGordo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Elegant product design. Easy to use and clean. Makes great coffee. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: JRC

customer_reviews.title: Cracked Glass
customer_reviews.text: Like other's have sad. The glass is very thin. Mine just cracked as well.
customer_reviews.author: N. Tomsic

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great and easy cold brew coffee maker! I had concerns about the lid not being air-tight and wrote to the company, who explained why they designed it this way, but also offered to custom make a tighter fitting lid if I wanted it. Excellent customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne W.

customer_reviews.title: Glass pitcher is fragile, cracks easily but company has great warranty policy
customer_reviews.text: This makes great cold brew, but in less than one month, my pitcher did form a small crack at the bottom. The company has a 60 day warranty and they did replace the pitcher for me. This is what I call great service. Thank you Kungroo for standing by your product! I will be more careful with the glass pitcher moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: Koolaya Pao

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my coffee-loving son and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Durable pitcher to make cold brew. Bought as a replacement for another brand. I prefer this one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this. Not cheap looking. Easy to use. Great taste.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Stricker

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use, simple to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this product. I was surprised by the thinness of the glass for the carafe. I’m extra careful not to break it. The metal strainer is very nice and does a good job. When strainer is in, the lid fits snugly, when strainer is out, it is loose, so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Elana D.

customer_reviews.title: Product as promised
customer_reviews.text: Easy to brew cold coffee. Been enjoying this product for a few months now and love it.
customer_reviews.author: 1L

customer_reviews.title: Product true to description
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. Use for cold tea brewing. Tea is flavorful brews overnight, not bitter.
customer_reviews.author: Adougred

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice product but wouldn’t purchase again. It doesn’t make a lot of coffee at once and you seem to use a lot of coffee grounds for one pot. I’ll keep it around to occasionally use from time to time but it won’t be my go to coffee option
customer_reviews.author: KymK

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Good
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, great tasting cold brew coffee. Could not be easier!
customer_reviews.author: L. Saucier

customer_reviews.title: Make and store in same container
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Have made cold coffee in it. Filter is easy to clean. Did not take long for me to get it . Have recommended it to my sister.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received this item in a timely fashion and it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this item in a timely fashion and it was well packaged. Really loving the cold brew coffee! None of the bite that accompanies hot coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Makes delicious iced coffee with a smooth flavor, no bitterness! Modern design, nice manageable size. Fast delivery, excellent customer service and follow up. Thank you. Would highly recommend and may buy 2nd for tea!
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product so much, I purchased three more. Got my sisters and my daughter one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Kungaroo! I was immediately impressed with the quality of the product. I used a Costa Rican coffee to make my first pot of cold brew. Its fabulous!! Thank you Kungaroo for a beautiful product that does exactly what you promise.
customer_reviews.author: Cat's Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Makes Great Cold Brew
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how easy it was to cold brew coffee. This is very simple to use, easy to clean and makes great coffee. Well worth the price for how much it's already saved me on afternoon iced coffee runs!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Raffenetti

customer_reviews.title: Nice design ... and makes good iced coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and easy to clean I would want to get a bigger size next time. I must drink way too much coffee.
customer_reviews.author: nancy j malone

customer_reviews.title: High quality, easy to use, perfect size
customer_reviews.text: High quality pitcher, filter, and lid, and perfect size to fit in my fridge. I've only made one batch so far, but it turned out great (even though I used a finer grind than I should have). The airtight lid seems to work well, the cold brew stayed fresh in the pitcher for several days.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: I Love Coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for a cold brew container, and this one caught my eye! Have used it for the first time a few days back and was not disappointed. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cold Brew Maker
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Christmas. It's his favorite gift. He uses it daily and truly enjoys the coffee. Easy to use, nice design and simple to clean. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Michaluk

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Cold Coffee Brewer, it does the job.
customer_reviews.text: After having it for a while, it did the good job then and after one year, it does a good job now.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel C

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife, she’s a cold brew coffee snob. The product had great reviews and came with all you would need to make a great cup of cold brew.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great brewer. I just have to experiment till I get my recipe down!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cold coffee brewer.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product. Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Pete V

customer_reviews.title: Save money from buying cold brew every morning, and get this now!
customer_reviews.text: I love my kungroo cold brew coffee maker! It’s so simple, and easy to use. And is saving me a ton of money every morning! I couldn’t have asked for a better purchase 😊
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It works exactly as stated no more no less. overall I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: lawrence mcdonough

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great ice cofffee. Haven’t bought a coffee since we got the cold brewer, already paid for itself.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I love this coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker. It makes great cold brewed ice tea too. I also like the way it fits on the self in the frigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Michaud

customer_reviews.title: SMELL..DRINK..ahhhhh
customer_reviews.text: Have had others...THIS THE BEST!!! Especially with Opras favorite tea!!
customer_reviews.author: kim brooks

customer_reviews.text: We have only had it for a couple weeks now, but seems to be working great at this point. It has a very sleek design as well. Would recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: mb2014

customer_reviews.title: This makes amazing cold coffee
customer_reviews.text: This makes amazing cold coffee. Got it for my husband and he love it's. It's easy to use and clean. Would recommend it for others.
customer_reviews.author: puertomedinaj

customer_reviews.title: Great cold brew!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. All I can say is the coffee came out amazing. Loved the pitcher. So happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The price was also great with fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my daughter, she loves it! The price was also great with fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: JeanR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size and Shape
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a smaller size cold brew coffee maker and this was perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use

product_meta.title: Kungroo Airtight Glass Cold Brew Iced Coffee Maker Pitcher Pot, 1 Quart
feature_bullets: NO PLASTICS, STRONG, THICK & PURE HIGH BOROSILICATE GLASS: Dishwasher Safe, BPA Free, Leakproof. With Removable Stainless Steel Infuser Filter, Lid & Airtight Silicon Sealer.
32 Oz CARAFE COLD BREWER SYSTEM: Makes Best Tasting Fresh Cold Brew Ice Coffee At Home.
SMOOTH & LOW ACID COFFEE: Use Coffee Grinds Or Ground In Our Brewer To Prepare Delicious, Smooth & Low Acid Cool Ice Coffee.
ICED TEA & COFFEE: Our Cold Brewer Makes both iced coffee & tea, Hot or Cold.

FITS IN SHELVES: Easily Fits In Refrigerator & Kitchen Shelves. Kungroo Makes One Of The Best Gifts For Her Birthday, Engagement, Valentines Day, Wedding Shower, bridesmaid, Women, Mom, Dad, Sister, Nurse, Him, Brother, Elders, Bride, Bridal Shower.
